H0.text: who was the artist of mickey mouse. Walt Disney

H1.text: who was the artist of mickey mouse. Floyd Gottfredson

H2.text: who was the artist of mickey mouse. Carl Barks

H3.text: who was the artist of mickey mouse. Ub Iwerks

A4.text: Iwerks was responsible for designing Mickey Mouse

A5.text: Walt Disney came up with the original sketch for the character that was eventually called Mickey Mouse

A7.text: Iwerks revised Disney's provisional sketches to make the character easier to animate
